projects.name: React personal website
projects.description: The website you are looking at right now is made using React! With some help of MUI components and simple CSS animations, I was able to create something that is nice to look at, alive and hopefully reflects my personality

projects.name: Wordle clone
projects.description: The hit daily game that took me and my friend groups by storm. I decided to try and recreate it by adding my own personal and questionable aesthetic flair to the game
